ModMetaData.name: Mortar Accuracy
ModMetaData.author: Hob Took
ModMetaData.description:
A collection of changes and options to make mortar accuracy better/worse, instead of having a fixed spread radius of 13 tiles.
-Accuracy is affected by a colonist's Intellectual and/or Shooting skills -Accuracy is affected by weather and time of day -Automatically lead moving targets -The miss chance caused by targets being in cover is removed
This affects all mortar shots, including enemy mortars.
Supports other mods: In general, any modded mortars are supported. (Technical: any building that uses the Verb_Shoot and doesn't require line of sight is affected) Verified functionality: [WD] Expanded Artillery, More Vanilla Turrets, Kaiser Armory
Load order does not matter to affect either of these mods.
